import React from 'react' import '../resources/css/Card.css' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { addItem } from '../store/Product' function ItemComponent({props}) { const dispatch=useDispatch() return (

{props.name}

Price: {props.price}$

In store: {props.avalible}

About:

{props.characteristics}

{setAmount(e.target.value)}} />

Counter:

) } export default ItemComponent
